title: july 20: a vaccine on the horizon
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the day Oxford University announced that its Covid-19 vaccine had successfully triggered an immune response against the virus. After, Maia examines how the music world responded when Neil Armstrong took his first steps on the moon. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
